insert into t_result_commit (plotting_scale, new_figure, old_figure, figure, medium_type, result_date, data_format, name, create_date, height_datum, memo, ref_id, meridian, coordinate) values (#{plottingScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newFigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldFigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{figure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediumType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dataFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{heightDatum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{meridian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinate,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_result_commit set plotting_scale = #{plottingScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_figure = #{newFigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_figure = #{oldFigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, figure = #{figure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medium_type = #{mediumType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_date = #{resultDate,jdbcType=DATE}, data_format = #{dataFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, height_datum = #{heightDatum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, meridian = #{meridian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
